Akhil Sankar a place to put my stuff.

Hello.

My name is Akhil and I am a software engineer who wields his powers to make stuff move in the physical domain.

Over the past nine years, I have worked as a software engineer in the IoT sector. Most recently, I worked as a Robotics Software Engineer with OpenShelf, testing a variety of sensor integrations and developing an AWS hosted MQTTS bidirectional telemetry pipeline physical robot. I am currently a graduate student at Rutgers University, pursuing my MS in Electrical and Computer Engineering, specializing in robotic systems and control.

As a side quest, I like simulating physical phenomena in software. I am currently working on a simple 2D game physics engine (courtesy of the fantastic Pikuma course on the subject). Check out my posts on this project, and others :)
